Description détaillée
ParamFilter parser.
This class parses the {urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:carddav}param-filter XML element, as defined in:
http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6352#section-10.5.2
The result will be spit out as an array.

Evert Pot (http://evertpot.com/) @license http://sabre.io/license/ Modified BSD License
Documentation des fonctions membres
xmlDeserialize() xmlDeserializeParamFilter ParamFilterxmlDeserialize
static xmlDeserialize (Reader $reader)[static]
The deserialize method is called during xml parsing.
This method is called statically, this is because in theory this method may be used as a type of constructor, or factory method.
Often you want to return an instance of the current class, but you are free to return other data as well.
You are responsible for advancing the reader to the next element. Not doing anything will result in a never-ending loop.
If you just want to skip parsing for this element altogether, you can just call $reader->next();
$reader->parseInnerTree() will parse the entire sub-tree, and advance to the next element.
Renvoie
mixed
Implémente XmlDeserializable.
La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/sabre/dav/lib/CardDAV/Xml/Filter/ParamFilter.php
